description: Rasmus Paludan's party came close to entering parliament in 2019 and now he faces a month in prison.
title: Danish far-right leader Paludan jailed for racism
title_page: Danish far-right leader Paludan jailed for racism - BBC News
maintext: In videos posted online Paludan made derogatory comments about Muslims, but argued he had not made the videos himself. He has also insisted he was upholding Denmark's tradition of free speech.
